code: import{SWITCH_LANGUAGE,TOGGLE_COLLAPSED_NAV,WINDOW_WIDTH,UPDATE_MENUS}from"constants/ActionTypes";import{LAYOUT_TYPE,NAV_STYLE,THEME_COLOR_SELECTION,THEME_TYPE}from"../../constants/ThemeSetting";import{UPDATE_STATE}from"../auth/actionType";export function toggleCollapsedSideNav(navCollapsed){return{type:TOGGLE_COLLAPSED_NAV,navCollapsed:navCollapsed};}export function updateWindowWidth(width){return{type:WINDOW_WIDTH,width:width};}export function setThemeType(themeType){return{type:THEME_TYPE,themeType:themeType};}export function setThemeColorSelection(colorSelection){return{type:THEME_COLOR_SELECTION,colorSelection:colorSelection};}export function onNavStyleChange(navStyle){return{type:NAV_STYLE,navStyle:navStyle};}export function onLayoutTypeChange(layoutType){return{type:LAYOUT_TYPE,layoutType:layoutType};}export function switchLanguage(locale){return{type:SWITCH_LANGUAGE,payload:locale};}export function onUpdateMenus(menus){return{type:UPDATE_MENUS,payload:menus};}export var updateState=function updateState(data){return{type:UPDATE_STATE,payload:data};};
